title: Creamy easy mushroom risotto
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '150g arborio rice', '250g mushrooms, chopped', '50ml white wine (optional)', '500ml vegetable stock', '50g Parmesan cheese shavings', '1 handful chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper', '1 tablespoon butter']
